name: Fairy Trail
description:
Fairy Trail is a Point'n Click and an asynchronous Puzzle Game in Voxel.

Restore beauty and harmony in the devastated world of Floravitia with Spring, the fairy who brings nature back to life in its wake.

~~ Team ~~
